name: Sociable Soccer
notes:
- Tested with keyboard not with x360 controller (this may follow in future).
- The only glitch right now is empty stands (no crowds/supporters visible).
content:
game:
  appid: 636690
  arch: win64
  prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
installer:
- task:
    arch: win64
    description: Creating Wine prefix
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
- task:
    app: win7
    arch: win64
    description: Setting Windows version to Windows 7
    name: winetricks
    prefix: $GAMEDIR/prefix
winesteam:
  dxvk: true
